text: Michael Kenneth Mann (born February 5, 1943) is an American movie director, screenwriter, and movie producer. He is known for his works in Manhunter, The Last of the Mohicans, Ali, Collateral, Hancock, and in Public Enemies. He won an Emmy Award in 1979. Mann was born on February 5, 1943 in Chicago, Illinois.Michael Mann Biography (1943-) at filmreference.com He studied at the University of Wisconsin-Madison. Mann has been married to Summer Mann since 1974.
